venue.name: Harvard Museum of Natural History, Geological Lecture Hall

item.description:
Why Evolution is True and Why Many People Still Don’t Believe It. Note the lecture is this Wednesday!!

.

By Jerry Coyne

Professor of Ecology and Evolution at the University of Chicago

 


"....and author of the seminal book, Why Evolution is True, is one of the world’s most eloquent defenders of evolutionary science in the face of legal, religious, and cultural opposition. In this talk, Coyne will explore the multifarious evidence for evolution, why Americans are so resistant to accepting the theory, and what can be done to make the country more evolution-friendly."

 

Free and open to the public, Geological Lecture Hall, 24 Oxford Street.

 

Free parking available in the 52 Oxford Street garage.

 

 

http://www.hmnh.harvard.edu/lectures-classes-events/evolution-matters-2012.html
item.how_to_find_us: Head into the lecture hall and grab a seat. I'll try to save some seats on the far right side.
item.name: Lecture: Why Evolution is True...
